revised_title: Observations on Crooked Fish in Welsh Pools
tldr: The author, Daines Barrington, describes his observations of crooked fish, specifically perch and trout, found in pools in Wales. He notes the peculiar crooked tail and hump on the back of these fish, and discusses their potential causes, such as the quality of the water in the pools. He also mentions the existence of similar fish in lakes in Sweden and France.
